item.title: Complete Roadmap to Become a Java Backend Developer in 2026
item.description:
Becoming a Java backend developer in 2026 is not just about learning Java syntax. The market expects you to understand scalable systems, cloud deployment, clean code practices, security, DevOps basics, and even how AI tools fit into development workflows.
